feed.title: Travis Mathison
feed.subtitle: A blog relating to malware reverse engineering and threat research.

entry.title: Hex-Rays IDA Tips and Tricks
entry.summary: Hex-Rays tips and tricks to IDA Pro Igor Skochinsky of Hex-Rays presents a new IDA Pro tip every week. This is more of a pointer toward a “season 1” compilation of these tips and to the Hex-Rays blog where they continue to be posted. The first 52 tips have been compiled into a single PDF document (by Hex-Rays): https://hex-rays.com/blog/igors-tip-of-the-week-season-01/ The continued series i...
